name: NSUserNotificationAction
desc: An action that the user can take in response to receiving a notification.DeprecatedUse the User Notifications framework instead.

items.name: init(identifier: String?, title: String?)
items.desc: Creates a user notification action with a specified identifier and title.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier for the user notification action.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The localized title shown to the user.
